value:
Saying "hippity-hop" makes my
ears bounce. It's fun, but I don't
know why.

What's hopping?$k$pI see how you're looking at me.
It's the spring festival. I have to
say "hop." A lot.

My brother must be the best-
looking bunny in this world.

Prince Alfonse dressed this way?
Hmm...

This is a lot of fun. I wish I could
spend more days like this.

The spring festival is on, and
$Nf is there.
You should come too.

I'll hop around the festival
some more.

Hippity-hop. I'm Veronica. I hear
there's some kind of festival here...
I'll join in.

Hippity-hop... A happy rabbit,
enjoying the springtime...that's me.$k$pIt seems everybody is having fun
here.$k$pHe's usually so serious... And he's
bravely suffering... But today, they're
both happy.$k$pI think I like spring...$k$pIt's getting to me, too. I'm about to
laugh—watch me. You can join in.
"Hippity-hop." Loki told me that this was appropriate. Isn't it?
This festival is really jumping! Get it? Jumping?
This clothing...well, it is nothing that I am used to.
He looks dashing dressed up like that, doesn't he? My brother, I mean.
As long as the spring festival continues, I will stay here. Even if that's forever...
